mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `Order` (userID, menuID, classID, quantity, totalPrice, createdAt) VALUES (#{userID}, #{menuID}, #{classID}, #{quantity}, #{totalPrice}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT orderID, U.userName, U.fullName, M.dishName, S.className, O.quantity, SD.scheduleName, totalPrice, isConfirm, feedback, O.createdAt, O.updatedAt FROM `Order` O, Menu M, User U, Class S, Schedule SD WHERE O.userID = U.userID AND O.classID = S.classID AND O.menuID = M.menuID AND M.scheduleID = SD.scheduleID AND DATE(O.createdAt) BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to} ORDER BY orderID DESC

SELECT orderID, U.userName, U.fullName, M.dishName, S.className, O.quantity, SD.scheduleName, totalPrice, isConfirm, feedback, O.createdAt, O.updatedAt FROM `Order` O, Menu M, User U, Class S, Schedule SD WHERE O.userID = U.userID AND O.classID = S.classID AND O.menuID = M.menuID AND M.scheduleID = SD.scheduleID AND U.userName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%') ORDER BY O.orderID DESC
